allow: Bash(powershell -Command "python -c ""from game_agent import GameAgent; print\(''Import successful''\)""")
Bash(powershell -Command "uv run python -c ""from game_agent import GameAgent; print\(''Import successful''\)""")

Bash(powershell -Command "uv run python -c ""from game_agent import GameAgent, AGENT_INSTRUCTIONS; print\(''Backward compatible import successful''\); print\(f''Agent instructions length: {len\(AGENT_INSTRUCTIONS\)} chars''\)""")
